channel.title: Adding points?

item.title: Adding points?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well i’m trying to add my own version of castle wars, but there is one problem, i’m not sure how to add points when you kill a player from the other team. These are the ints for the points.

public int Zamorakp = 0; public int Saradominp = 0;

And this is under case 73:

else if(plz.team == team && incwars() == true && team == 0) { sendMessage("Zamorak does not want you attacking your own players!"); } else if(plz.team == team && incwars() == true && team == 1) { sendMessage("Saradomin does not want you attacking your own players!"); }
So it knows that you can’t attack your own players. This works in game, but this is only attacking other players, not actually killing them.

Please help.

Read full topic
